attributes.action: call for an emergency session of the United Nations Security Council amid warnings of a pending illegal US attack on Iran
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While evidence mounts for a planned illegal U.S. attack against Iran in early April 2007 the Prime Minister should support calls for a emergency session of the United Nations Security Council tasked with dealing with the current preparations for an illegal use of force against Iran and the destruction of the basis of the United Nations Charter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
